page.title: 12Transport
page.content: Most people in the area have a{private {motor vehicle}such as a car or Land Rover.There is little{public {transport}and only two regular bus services.There used to be more.Buses also transport children to secondary school and schoolchildren on trips or to the swimming baths at Buxton. Primary school children are brought to school in a{taxi}and taken home each day. Many{heavy lorries}and cars come through the Village causing a lot of noise and dirt.Few of them stop.Winter weather can often{block the roads}and the road can be closed for several days after a severe snow.In summer there is a lot of{tourist traffic.
